text: “When the Son of the Man comes in His glory,The Lord Jesus uses “the coming of the Son of the Man” to refer to both the Rapture and the Second Advent. and all the holy angels with Him,Perhaps 4% of the Greek manuscripts omit “holy” (as in NIV, NASB, LB, TEV, etc.). From Revelation 5:11 it appears that the holy angels are well over 100 million. then He will sit on His throne of glory.
